content.text: I'm a quiet person. I like to be cozy and I love my dog.
I love to bake and I hide things from my family to protect them.
That's interesting. What kinds of things do you like to bake?
I love to bake cakes and pies. I have a sweet tooth.
My favorite band is The Beatles.
I love watermelon! It's so sweet and juicy.
I love to relax in the low tide and think about my family.
I'm not a fan of the dark. I'm afraid of what I can't see.
I'm not a huge fan of caffeine either. It gives me the jitters.
I don't consume caffeine either. I think it's bad for you.
I guess we have a few things in common.
We do! I think we would get along well.
I think so too. Maybe we can get together sometime and bake a cake.
That would be fun! I love to bake with friends.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it.
